subject: Re: Hamcrest Type mismatch
msgSnippet: How about this hack? package org.hamcrest; public class MyMatcherAssert { public static  void assertThat(Object actual, Matcher matcher) { assertThat( ,
messageBody:
How about this hack?

package org.hamcrest;

public class MyMatcherAssert {
public static <T> void assertThat(Object actual, Matcher<T> matcher) {
assertThat("", actual, matcher);
}

public static <T> void assertThat(String reason, Object actual,
Matcher<T> matcher) {
if (!matcher.matches(actual)) {
Description description = new StringDescription();
description.appendText(reason)
.appendText("\nExpected: ")
.appendDescriptionOf(matcher)
.appendText("\n got: ")
.appendValue(actual)
.appendText("\n");

throw new java.lang.AssertionError(description.toString());
}
}

}
